item.description:
East bound Route 9, take a left onto Lyman Street, (at Burger King), take first left onto Chauncy street. Take a right at the stop sign. First right to dirt parking/launching area.

West bound Route 9, take a right onto Lyman Street, (at Burger King). take first left onto Chauncy Street.
Take a right at the stop sign. First right to dirt parking/launching area.
item.name: Nice after work Kayak on Chauncy Lake - Westboro
